short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close tabs quickly and in various ways.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you have tens of tabs open, it's often hard to close them. You need to decide which ones stay and which ones go. This extension lists all tabs in one page, and offers various ways to filter the tabs so that you can quickly find the tabs you want to close, and do whatever you want with the rest of the tabs.
